title: Visa extension and change of status approvals
dataVerified: Full name, passport number, current status, new status/extension, approval date, receipt number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Extension/change status (approved/pending/denied). Link to USCIS system (employers and applicant, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake extension/change approvals. Domain binding verifies USCIS (uscis.gov). Work authorization continuation. Stay compliance verification. I-539/I-129 approval documentation. Uses SHA-512 (government ID privacy).
